parameters.query: SELECT key, value FROM config WHERE key = COALESCE($1, '')

INSERT INTO config (key, value, updated_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, NOW())
ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE
SET value = EXCLUDED.value, updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING key, value

SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projections WHERE projection_type = 'activity' AND status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed') AND (data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz >= CURRENT_DATE) as activities_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projections WHERE projection_type = 'note' AND status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed') AND (data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE)) as notes_this_week,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM events WHERE payload->>'source_type' = 'discord') as total_events,
  (SELECT MAX(received_at) FROM events) as last_activity

WITH activities_data AS (
  SELECT 
    'activity' as type,
    p.id,
    (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp,
    p.data->>'category' as category,
    p.data->>'description' as text,
    e.payload->>'discord_guild_id' as guild_id,
    e.payload->>'discord_channel_id' as channel_id,
    e.payload->>'discord_message_id' as message_id
  FROM projections p
  LEFT JOIN events e ON p.event_id = e.id
  WHERE p.projection_type = 'activity'
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed')
    AND $1::text IN ('activities', 'activity', '')
  ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC
  LIMIT $2::int
),
notes_data AS (
  SELECT 
    'note' as type,
    p.id,
    (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp,
    p.data->>'category' as category,
    p.data->>'text' as text,
    e.payload->>'discord_guild_id' as guild_id,
    e.payload->>'discord_channel_id' as channel_id,
    e.payload->>'discord_message_id' as message_id
  FROM projections p
  LEFT JOIN events e ON p.event_id = e.id
  WHERE p.projection_type = 'note'
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed')
    AND $1::text IN ('notes', 'note')
  ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC
  LIMIT $2::int
)
SELECT * FROM activities_data
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM notes_data
ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

WITH user_events AS (
  SELECT 
    payload->>'author_login' as user_login,
    MAX(received_at) as last_observation_at
  FROM events
  WHERE payload->>'author_login' IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY payload->>'author_login'
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  ue.user_login,
  ue.last_observation_at,
  p.data->>'category' as last_activity_category,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ue.last_observation_at))/60 as minutes_since_activity
FROM user_events ue
LEFT JOIN projections p ON p.projection_type = 'activity' 
  AND p.data->>'timestamp' = (
    SELECT MAX(data->>'timestamp') 
    FROM projections 
    WHERE projection_type = 'activity'
  )

parameters.jsCode:
// Handle help command
const ctx = $('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.ctx;

const helpText = `üìö **Kairon Help**

**Message Tags**
Tag your messages to classify them:

\`!! <message>\` or \`act <message>\` - Log an activity
\`.. <message>\` or \`note <message>\` - Capture a note
\`++ <message>\` or \`chat <message>\` - Start a conversation thread
\`-- <message>\` or \`save <message>\` - Save thread insights (coming soon)
\`:: <command>\` or \`cmd <command>\` - Execute a command
\`$$ <message>\` or \`todo <message>\` - Create a todo (coming soon)

**Semantic Tagging**
No tag? Kairon uses AI to classify your message:
- First-person actions ‚Üí !! (activity)
- Observations/notes ‚Üí .. (note)
- Questions/requests ‚Üí ++ (conversation)

**Commands**

**Configuration:**
\`::get <key>\` - Get a config value
\`::set <key> <value>\` - Set a config value

**Information:**
\`::stats\` - Show activity statistics
\`::recent activities [N]\` - Show last N activities (default 10)
\`::recent notes [N]\` - Show last N notes (default 10)
\`::status\` - Show your current state

**Data Management:**
\`::delete activity <number>\` - Delete activity by index
\`::delete note <number>\` - Delete note by index

**System:**
\`::ping\` - Test if system is working
\`::help\` - Show this message

**Config Keys:**
- \`north_star\` - Your guiding principle
- \`summary_time\` - Daily summary time (HH:MM format)

**Examples:**
\`!! working on the router\`
\`.. John loves dark roast coffee\`
\`++ what should I focus on today?\`
\`::set north_star Focus on deep work\`
\`::recent activities 20\`
\`::delete activity 1 3 5\``;

return {
  ctx: {
    ...ctx,
    response: {
      content: helpText
    }
  }
};

parameters.query:
-- Void projection by index (1-based position in recent list) - NEVER DELETE
WITH input_array AS (
  SELECT ARRAY[
    NULLIF($2, '')::int,
    NULLIF($3, '')::int,
    NULLIF($4, '')::int,
    NULLIF($5, '')::int,
    NULLIF($6, '')::int,
    NULLIF($7, '')::int,
    NULLIF($8, '')::int,
    NULLIF($9, '')::int,
    NULLIF($10, '')::int
  ] as indices
),
target_indices AS (
  SELECT (unnest(indices) - 1) AS idx
  FROM input_array
),
recent_activities AS (
  SELECT 
    p.id,
    (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp,
    p.data->>'description' as text,
    'activity' as type,
    (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC) - 1) as idx
  FROM projections p
  WHERE p.projection_type = 'activity'
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed')
    AND $1::text = 'activity'
  ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC
  LIMIT 100
),
recent_notes AS (
  SELECT 
    p.id,
    (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp,
    p.data->>'text' as text,
    'note' as type,
    (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC) - 1) as idx
  FROM projections p
  WHERE p.projection_type = 'note'
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed')
    AND $1::text = 'note'
  ORDER BY (p.data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz DESC
  LIMIT 100
),
voided_activities AS (
  UPDATE projections
  SET status = 'voided',
      voided_at = NOW(),
      voided_reason = 'user_deleted'
  WHERE id IN (
    SELECT ra.id FROM recent_activities ra
    INNER JOIN target_indices ti ON ra.idx = ti.idx
  )
  RETURNING id, (data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp, data->>'description' as text, 'activity' as type
),
voided_notes AS (
  UPDATE projections
  SET status = 'voided',
      voided_at = NOW(),
      voided_reason = 'user_deleted'
  WHERE id IN (
    SELECT rn.id FROM recent_notes rn
    INNER JOIN target_indices ti ON rn.idx = ti.idx
  )
  RETURNING id, (data->>'timestamp')::timestamptz as timestamp, data->>'text' as text, 'note' as type
)
SELECT * FROM voided_activities
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM voided_notes;
